message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. I can do $110, which is a great deal for you. Would you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $105, which is a fair price for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I can see you're really close to making a decision. I'm willing to make one last concession. I can do $108, which is my absolute minimum. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're making a last concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll meet you halfway between $100 and $108. Would you consider $102?
I've already made a big concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $108. I'm willing to hold firm on this price. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're holding firm on the price, but I'm still not comfortable with $108. I'll have to pass on this deal. I think I'll go with John's offer of $100 instead.
